placard.para: Placard near EICAS "DEFUEL VALVES INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar associated L/R TANK DEFUEL VALVES circuit breakers (L 34B1, R 34B2).
Locate the defueling valve actuator on the dry side of the inboard rear spar just inboard of each center tank end rib. Access is through the main landing gear shock strut door.
Remove cap and stow valve electrical connector.
Lockwire actuator manual override handle in the CLOSED position.
Notify Flight Dispatch that the Defuel Valves are inoperative.
